column2: Forge Hermetic Bloodline

By combining different sources of ancient knowledge gathered over my lifetime, I can perform an arcane ritual which will bind myself and all of my descendents to the fabric of the universe. The results will surely be empowering...
[Root.GetFirstName]'s Hermetic Blood

[Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] has delved deeper into ancient secrets than anyone before [Root.GetHerHim]. Some say that [Root.GetSheHe] used this mystical knowledge to tie [Root.GetHerHim]self and [Root.GetHerHis] descendants into the forces binding the universe together - but of course those are nothing but wild unsubstantiated rumours...
Respected by the §YHermetic Society§!
Is a §YMagus§! in the §YHermetic Society§!
Has §YLearning of at least 40§! (this requirement is decreased with extremely-impressive laboratories)
Has §Yan impressive laboratory§! and §YLearning of at least 35§!
Has §Yan impressive laboratory§! and §YLearning of at least 30§!
Owns a §YTome of Forbidden Elder Knowledge§!.\n§GEven though this tome suggests some unusual and disquieting procedures, I'm sure that the outcome will be truly amazing!§!
§GThe knowledge contained in the Tome of Forbidden Elder Knowledge will surely improve my results...§!
